page.title: 04TYPICAL DAYS
page.content:
I got up at 8.30am,had my breakfast watched Soul-Train on video from the night before.9.00am,had a wash and got dressed. I also washed my hair then went and caught the bus to Herne Bay at 10.10am, got a single ticket that cost 50 pence. Had a look around Herne Bay Market , met a friend and went back to her house in Herne and stayed there for a couple of hours,then caught another bus home to Sturry, arrived home at 6.30pm,had my tea,and played some records.
{Nicola Leftley} I was born on the 6th July 1971. I am in 3N, which has 15 boys and 8 girls. {4th July, Thursday 1985} I got up at 6.40 am. For breakfast I had some weetabix which I ate at 6.53 am. I left home for school at 8.30 am. & arrived at 8.30 am
